title: Information Presentation Strategy Design for Game-Based Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic mathematical concepts (equations, functions, etc.)
context.additional_context: Environment enabling simple game-based activities using smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can explain problem-solving strategies with 80% accuracy using mathematical concepts provided before gameplay
Learners can correct conceptual application errors within two attempts through the in-game feedback system.
Learners creatively apply three or more mathematical principles in project outputs after game-based activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
